Question.Subject: i am online but my computer says that i am not?
Question.Content: the little box on the right hand of my computer that states that i am connected to the internet has an x on it saying that i am not in fact connected, but here i am on the internet... why is that? just askin
Question.ChosenAnswer: Yeah I have the same thing, its something to do with your network connection. I have ADSL & when I use the USB cable I get the X saying Local Area connection - a networkcable is unplugged but if I use the ethernet cable I dont get that message. (I have to share my cables if you are wondering why I dont use both) Hope that makes some sense, anyway so long as it works Im happy :)

Answer.Content: Yeah I have the same thing, its something to do with your network connection. I have ADSL & when I use the USB cable I get the X saying Local Area connection - a networkcable is unplugged but if I use the ethernet cable I dont get that message. (I have to share my cables if you are wondering why I dont use both) Hope that makes some sense, anyway so long as it works Im happy :)
